Package cbccore.motors

Provides the high-level siblings for the Motor and Servo classes found in cbccore.low.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Motor Adds a clean API to replace cbccore.low.Motor, and even adds a few minor features & workarounds for known motor controlling issues.
Servo  
 

Package cbccore.motors Description

Provides the high-level siblings for the Motor and Servo classes found in cbccore.low. Additionally, it includes a few additional ways of abstracting the motors, via wrappers and the like. You will also find that the Motor and Servo classes in here add some functionality themselves. For example, you are allowed to change the speed at which a Servo moves.
